Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 31st/Central Park
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Millard,32nd and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near 31st/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Millard, 32nd and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near 31st/Central Park.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
